name: RUSH Speedrunner
description:
RUSH Speedrunner is a fast paced game. Each character has different abilities and beat each other in different tasks. The racer character, unlocked from the start can do a quick dash forward. The basketball player can jump higher than the rest of the characters. The astronaut has lower gravity, so jumping and falling are slowed. The roller skater can move faster than any other character, except the ground is slippery like ice. The jetpack guy can begin to fly in a jetpack for a short period of time. More characters are coming soon.

Custom levels can be created, and uploaded. If your level is well made, it will be curated and downloaded on all devices.
